info.title: AfricasTalking HTTP Notifiers
info.description: HTTP service for interacting with callbacks supporting AfricasTalking APIs

post.description: Sent whenever a user opts out of receiving messages from your alphanumeric sender ID
Sent whenever an MSP confirms or rejects delivery of a message.
Sent whenever a message is sent to any of your registered shortcodes.
Sent whenever someone subscribes or unsubscribes from any of your premium SMS products.
Callback URL that sends request data our App using HTTP POST.
Voice Notification delivered to our callback URL
Event Notifications sent from AT after call transfer initiated.

get.description: JSON document containing the API swagger definition

requestId.description: The request ID sent back as a response to the airtime send request.

amount.description: Amount - in the provided currency - that the client will receive.

currencyCode.description: The 3-digist ISO format currency for the value of this transaction

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the mobile subscriber receiving the airtime.

transactionId.description: The transaction id within Africaâ€™s Talking.

payload.description: The MQTT packet sent by the publishing device.

topic.description: Message channel to which the message was sent by the publishing MQTT client

amount.description: Amount - in the provided currency - that the client will receive.

currencyCode.description: The 3-digist ISO format currency for the value of this transaction

metadata.description: A map of metadata associated with this request.

Alias minima debitis ullam necessitatibus repudiandae.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the mobile subscriber receiving the B2C payment.

sourceIpAddress.description: The IPv4 address that initiated the B2C transaction.

transactionId.description: The transaction id within Africaâ€™s Talking.

clientAccount.description: Account name used by a mobile subscriber to initiate this transaction.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the mobile subscriber who is initiating the C2B transaction.

productName.description: Identifies the Africaâ€™s Talking Payment Product used to facilitate this transaction.

provider.description: Payment provider that is facilitating this transaction

providerMetadata.description: Additional data received from a payment provider for a particular transaction

Tempora consequatur aut voluptatem animi ipsa sint.

value.description: Value being exchanged in this transaction
value.example: Quam rerum rem magnam eveniet quasi.

example.clientAccount: Omnis dolores laborum deserunt sed ut repudiandae.

Illum sit architecto nobis incidunt facilis adipisci.

clientAccount.description: Account name used by a mobile subscriber to initiate this transaction.

description.description: A detailed description of this transaction.

destination.description: Unique identifier of the party  receiving the funds for this transaction.
destination.example: Minima voluptatem modi quidem quo aut necessitatibus.

destinationType.description: Unique identifier of the party receiving funds in this transaction (the Credit Party).

productName.description: Africaâ€™s Talking Payment Product used to facilitate this transaction.

provider.description: Payment provider that facilitated this transaction.

providerChannel.description: Name or number of channel that used to facilitate this payment.
providerChannel.example: Rerum magnam quis sunt voluptatem dolores.

providerFee.description: Fee charged by a payment provider to facilitate this transaction.

providerMetadata.description: Any additional data that we receive from a payment provider for a particular transaction.

providerRefId.description: Unique ID generated by the payment provider for this transaction.

requestMetadata.description: Any metadata that was sent by your application when it initiated this transaction.
requestMetadata.example: Aut quae atque quo eos amet facere.

source.description: Unique identifier of the party that is providing the funds for this transaction.

sourceType.description: Type of party providing the funds for this transaction (the Debit Party).

status.description: The final status of this transaction

transactionDate.description: The date and time when a successful transaction was completed.

transactionFee.description: Transaction fee charged by Africaâ€™s Talking for this transaction.

transactionId.description: Unique transactionId generated for every payment.

value.description: Value being exchanged in this transaction.
value.example: Soluta nulla libero consequuntur quo vel.

example.providerMetadata: Illo adipisci ut consectetur et dignissimos.
example.requestMetadata: Reprehenderit error vero necessitatibus eaque quo.
example.source: Iusto quaerat ea voluptatibus laudantium unde.

phoneNumber.description: Mobile phone number of the subscriber who opted out.

senderId.description: Shortcode/Alphanumeric Sender ID the user opted out from.
senderId.example: Commodi iusto velit dolores error libero.

example.phoneNumber: Fugit ut pariatur eum sit et et.

failureReason.description: Only provided if status is Rejected or Failed.

id.description: A unique identifier for each message.

networkCode.description: A unique identifier for the Telco that handled the message.

phoneNumber.description: Mobile phone number message was sent out to.

retryCount.description: Number of times the request to send a message to the device was retried before it succeeded or definitely failed.

example.phoneNumber: Eos qui sint ratione animi quo.

date.description: The date and time when the message was received.

from.description: The number that sent the message.

id.description: The internal ID that we use to store this message.

linkId.description: Parameter required when responding to an on-demand user request with a premium message.

networkCode.description: A unique identifier for the telco that handled the message.

text.example: Dolorem nihil molestias repellat ut unde.

to.description: The number to which the message was sent.

example.linkId: Cupiditate omnis est necessitatibus molestias veritatis ullam.

keyword.description: The product keyword that the user has subscribed or unsubscribed from.

phoneNumber.description: Mobile phone number to subscribe or unsubscribe.

shortCode.description: The short code that has this product.

example.phoneNumber: Cumque ut rerum et dolor est quisquam.

networkCode.description: Telco of the mobile number interacting with USSD application.

phoneNumber.description: Mobile number of the subscriber interacting with USSD application.

sessionId.description: A unique value generated when the session starts.
sessionId.example: Omnis facere eum possimus aut voluptatem.

example.sessionId: Quos iusto rerum ut laboriosam totam.

response.description: Plain text response back to AT gateway

example.callTransferParam: Vitae eligendi architecto et possimus praesentium harum.

amount.description: The total cost of the call.

callSessionState.description: The final status of the call.

callerCountryCode.description: The code of the country the callerNumber is calling from.

callerNumber.description: The phone number of the phone user in the call, in international format.

currencyCode.description: The currency used to bill this call (e.g KES, USD, GBP).

destinationNumber.description: Africaâ€™s Talking phone number, in international format

dialDestinationNumber.description: The number which a call was forwarded to if the Dial action was used.

dialDurationInSeconds.description: The duration of the dialed call if the Dial action was used.

dialStartTime.description: The time the dial action began if the Dial action was used.
dialStartTime.example: Reiciendis ex nemo dolores aut natus ut.

direction.description: Whether this is an inbound or outbound call
direction.example: Assumenda doloremque et est architecto quidem.

dtmfDigits.description: The digits that a user enters in response to a getDigits request

durationInSeconds.description: The duration of the call in seconds.

hangupCause.description: The reason a call could have ended

isActive.description: Lets us know whether the call is in session state

recordingUrl.description: The URL of the recording made for this call

sessionId.description: A unique identifier generated during each call session

example.callerCountryCode: Dolorem itaque maiores perspiciatis non nobis.
example.currencyCode: Incidunt molestiae voluptate ullam dignissimos sunt ut.
example.dialDurationInSeconds: Molestiae aperiam est itaque nihil et.
example.dialStartTime: Quis deleniti ducimus quis cumque et.
example.isActive: At fuga voluptatem repellat modi eveniet perferendis.
example.sessionId: Aut consequatur eum laborum quam labore.
